name: Remove Favorite Team Tint Color Logic
description:
Reference:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/CATCH-877

There are several Accessibility concerns around the existing Favorite Team tint color applied to the Top/Bottom Navigation bars if a user has a Favorite Team set, so Design would like this logic removed so that the Navigation Bar only supports Light/Dark mode color themes.

Acceptance Criteria
Existing Favorite Team tint color logic for the Top/Bottom Nav bars should be removed

Navigation bars only support Light/Dark mode color themes
